text: Lisa Pollak is an American journalist. She won a 1997 Pulitzer Prize for Feature Writing. She studied at Northwestern University. She worked for the Baltimore Sun and WBEZ's This American Life. == References == Category:Living people Category:Year of birth missing (living people) Category:American journalists Category:Pulitzer Prize winners Category:1970s births Category:Columbia University faculty Category:University of Michigan alumni
title: Lisa Pollak
